Signature

medium: Etching in brown ink on thin Japan
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York; sold December 8, 1993, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed in plate, lower left: [J.-B. Carpeaux inv.]
title: Ugolino
